pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis and Visualization of Circular Data // Circumplex models, which organize constructs in a circle around two underlying dimensions, are popular for studying interpersonal functioning, mood/affect, and vocational preferences/environments. This package provides tools for analyzing and visualizing circular data, including scoring functions for relevant instruments and a generalization of the bootstrapped structural summary method from Zimmermann Wright (2017) doi:10.1177/1073191115621795 and functions for creating publication-ready tables and figures from the results.
